In addition to cataract, your eye care professional can check for signs of age-related macular degeneration, glaucoma, and other vision disorders. For many eye diseases, early treatment may save your sight.",NIHSeniorHealth,Cataract
What is (are) Cataract ?,"A cataract is a clouding of the lens in the eye that affects vision. Most cataracts are related to aging. Cataracts are very common i
